Articles.Content: You're clearly cheating by being online.
Ignoring rule number 2? Textbook cheating. Virtuous posters always point out the real way to do it.
First one to use that Awesome gif by TheFighterC4? Many people now also using it in their sigs? Cheater! Real players never start a new trend!
Putting a quote regarding Whackjob? That's cheating, dude.
Joining 7 months after me and having more posts than me? CHEATER! HAX USER! Theres no way you could have more posts than me if you joined after me! Simple Logic! real players dont use HAX!
Do you even cheat bro? Yeah, you do, because you used logic on the internet.

You're clearly cheating by not having a full orbit as your avatar.

(am I doing this right?)
Using tha Voyager to fly over Kerbin is cheating bro, there are no excuses for this....
Taking a photo of sun? CHEATER! Normal people would get blind if they tried to do it!
Being an alien? You must be cheating!

Accusing someone of cheating without telling them how to really do it? You need to join Cheaters Anonymous. Everyone knows the Right Way to do it is by giving a non-cheaty example.

Seriously, some of you are turning this into "Ban the User Above You". The second half of this game is the funny part.

Accusing someone of cheating without telling them how to really do it? You need to join Cheaters Anonymous. Everyone knows the Right Way to do it is by giving a non-cheaty example.

Seriously, some of you are turning this into "Ban the User Above You". The second half of this game is the funny part.

Really? Advertising your own self-help company on a game forum? That's cheating! The proper way to do it is to sign a deal with a greedy corporation who will market it for you in exchange for lots of money and your soul.
What? You told him they would take his soul?!? Cheater! Everyone knows you never tell tell people you're going to steal their soul!
Oh come on! Bold is cheating! You clearly need to call 1-800 BAN-BOLD!

Putting a phone number in a post?!? Cheater! You should only post email addresses in posts!

Edited May 25, 2014 by Endersmens

Aha! Grammatical errors signify cheating! "Putting a phone number is a post?!?"

You are the true cheater, sir!

Aha! Grammatical errors signify cheating! "Putting a phone number is a post?!?"

You are the true cheater, sir!

Accepted. :headhunginshame: (fixed it if it makes any difference. )

But wait, what is this? Look at your rep description! "Dat Red Dragon" Dat is a slang word, and is grammatically incorrect! HYPOCRISY!!! Hypocrisy is cheating man! Real players are never hypocrites!
Do not get me started on your rep description! Sr. Spacecraft Engineer?!? I think not, with only 330 posts! CHEATER!

Banned for having 600+ posts.

Whoops.......

Edited May 25, 2014 by Souper
Whoops, wrong thread.
Reading multiple threads simultaneously and posting in the wrong one? That's some cheating, my friend. Pros read one thread at a time.

You're a red crown? CHEATER!!!!

- - - Updated - - -

That super is a spy! CHEATER!
Spy Freud slipping?? Cheater. Real spies never reveal themselves by mistake.
You said spy CHEATER. It is cheating to mention spys.

HYPOCRISY! HYPOCRISY!

As said before, hypocrisy signifies cheating.

You are not cheating? Ok.

The below poster can post? CHEEEEAAAATIIIIIIIING!!!!!!
